attributes.action: Impose some sort of compulsory Insurance to be taken out by cyclist against damage to Motor Vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cyclist share the same road system that we "the motorists" use and have to be tested to do so as well as pay dearly for the right thereof        
Cyclists enjoy the same priveledge free and yet seem to totally ignore the basic rules of the road
They also cause untold damage to vehicles with no threat of recourse from the owners

Iwould like to see bicyles being liscenced to its owners, a number plate of some sort  being visible and lastly that they be made to take out an insurance cover to cover the damage they create
and that they also be penalised for the contravention of road laws
